title: Battle Talent
description: Battle Talent is a challenging physics-based roguelite sword-fighting game, you can create your own fighting style and experience unparalleled gameplay in a mega seamless procedural dungeon . With over 80 enemy variants, 100 weapons, and 60 perks, the possibilities are endless. Join forces with your friends to take down enemies Experience rich multiplayer interactions and create powerful combos Engage in realistic combat in Mixed Reality Mode (supports multiplayer) Experience thrilling physical combat with spell, melee, and ranged attacks. Beware, target the boss Customize your talent points in Roguelike levels and unlock unexpected treasure. Explore Sandbox Mode to experiment with 2000+ mods and Scene Editor feature. Out of Sight
